Html:
Hello,

I have downloaded the software, but it shows a message of error saying "The selected file is not a valid ISO file. Please select a valid ISO file and try again". I have tried another ISO file but it still shows the same message.

Regards

Ali Al-Salman
I have the same problem. What do I use for an .iso file? There must be 50 of them listed. It just says to select one, but which one?
Does anyone answer these posts. the first one was written in 2012, with no reply?$%#@

Not all ISO files have the same internal structure.
This software requires one specific structure, and rejects all others.
Google-search for "not a valid ISO file", to find a good step-by-step-description on how to make an updated copy of your ISO file.
Still, that's not a good reason for this software to recognize other internal structures.

I have the same problem. What do I use for an .iso file? There must be 50 of them listed. It just says to select one, but which one?
